dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3750589K] Problem with one of domain hosted at ThePlanet servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3750589K] Problem with one of domain hosted at
ThePlanet servers

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

designates 87.230.14.130 as permitted sender) client-ip=87.230.14.130;
envelope-from=admin@totohost.hr; helo=totohost.hr; 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 Apr 2007 19:57:11.0019 (UTC)
FILETIME=[6EBA6BB0:01C776F3] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
Domain "whereisanykey.com" at ThePlanet IP 209.85.98.19 have stolen
almost 
complete content/data from my Company web site (www.totohost.hr) 
 
For example, if you compare his 
"http://www.whereisanykey.com/zastita_osobnih_podataka.html" with my web

page "http://www.totohost.hr/zastita_osobnih_podataka.htm" you will
notice 
that he even did not change company name in text. 
 
And thats not all, he even put my mobile number and address in WHOIS of
that 
domain. I think that man is not normal. 
 
Can you please contact owner of server at IP 209.85.98.19 (thats
probably 
same man). 
 
Thank you in advance.  
Tino Andrijic 
==================== 
TOTOHOST.HR 
www.totohost.hr 
info@totohost.hr 
tel. 020/716-679 
fax. 020/711-641 
mob. 091/509-1182 
-------------------- 
Web hosting provider 
Registracija domena
